interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 120 Pieces Face Lift Tapes with 9 Pieces Listing Ropes, Invisible Face Lifting Tapes and Bands, Double Chin Lifting Tape, Neck Lifting Patch, Skin Lifting Sticker for Women
Review Date: 2022/03/17
Store: tchrules
Average Rating: 2.8
Product Details: {'Brand': 'tchrules', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Unit Count': '16.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '120', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 3.7 x 0.75 inches; 1.13 Ounces'}
Review Text: I was ecstatic to receive my face lift tape but very disappointed. It comes off very easily especially in the hot weather. The tape doesn’t last but 30 minutes on your face. It will not stick if you apply makeup. Band not long enough
Review Title: Not so great
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------

Very thin but nice hair Nice hair BeautyGirl Hair Brazilian Water Wave 4 Bundles 16 18 20 22inches Unprocessed Water Wave Curly Human Hair Weave Brazilian Water Wave Virgin Hair Bundles Natural Color BeautyGirl {'Brand': 'BeautyGirl', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '22 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Curly', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '10.94 x 7.68 x 2.76 inches; 10.23 Ounces'} Your ad said Brazilian Water Wave human hair. This is not Human hair. I received a blend of synthetic hair. This was false advertisement. Not good.

Taylor Very disappointment with this hair Brazilian Kinky Weave Hair Virgin Hair Kinky Curly Remy Brazillian 100% Human Hair Weave Jerry Curly Virgin Remy Human Hair Bundles Brown Human Hair Weave kinky curly 18 20 22 Inch NIUDINNG NIUDINNG {'Brand': 'NIUDINNG', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '22 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Material Feature': 'Durable'} Well, I have tried many of Amazon Weave hair and this was not a good selection. It was very thin and stringy, not good quality. I put one bundle on and I am sure it is not human hair. I returned the package back to the seller for a refund. Just my opinion Brazilian Kinky weave hair is not as good as it looks NiegMeag 20 Inch Kinky Curly Bundles Wave 1 Human Hair 8A Grade 100% Brazilian Unprocessed Virgin Remy Extension Weave Natural Black Can Be Dyed and Bleached, Bundle NiegMeag ["Hair Texture: Curly Wave Human Hair Bundles.Material: 100% Unprocessed Brazilian Human Hair.Human Hair Type: Brazilian Remy Human Hair. Weave Hair Human Bundles.Color: Natural Black ColorUnit Weight: 1 Bundles ,95-100g/piece.Hair Weft: Machine Double Wefts.Can Be Permed: Yes,But Please Be Careful Not to Exceed 125°F ! Otherwise it Will Damage The Hair !Hair Smell: It May Have Local Shampoo Smell, but It Will Disappear Fast After Co-Wash, Don'T Worry.How To Take Care Of The Hair?1. Wash The Hair Regularly.2. Detangle Hair Gently Before Washing. Do Not Rub or Twist It.3. Add Mild Shampoo To Cool Water and Swish Hair Till Clean. Rinse Thoroughly.4. Blot Out Excess Water With Towel and Allow Hair to Dry Naturally. Do Not Expose to The Sun.5. Comb Hair Gently With Wide Toothed Comb or With Your Fingers . 6. Brush Straighter Hair in a Downward Motion Straight With The Ends. FAQ:Q1: Will It Shedding?A1: For New Hair, A Few Strands of Hair Initial Shedding is Normal Like Our Own Hair. The Hair is Double Machine Weft to Avoid Shedding.Hair Shedding Can Be Caused by Many Things. Heat Damage From Blow-Dryers, Curling Irons, And Flatirons, As Well As Coloring Will Result in Breakage.Q2: Return/Refund Policy?A2: You Can Return to us if You or Your Family Doesnt Like Our Hair .But Don'T Break The Package."] {'Brand': 'NiegMeag', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Installation Type': 'Weave', 'UPC': '679265464058'} Very bad quality hair Bad quality Brazilian Hair Ombre Bundles Deep Wave Human Hair 3 Bundles T1B-4-27 Ombre Virgin Hair 3 Bundles 100G/Pcs Unprocessed Remy Human Hair Double Weft Weave Three Tone Light Brown Mix Blonde（16 18 20 Inch） Agnes ["Choose Agnes Hair,Choose Rest Assured!We Are Located In Xuchang,Henan Province,China'S Factory;Global Wig Base,With More Than 20 Years Of Wig Production Experience!The Main Products Of The Factory Are Hair Bundles,Closure Front,Hair Wigs Etc Hair Material:100 Percent Unprocessed Brazilian Virgin Human Hair Ombre Highlight Bundles Material Grade: 10A Virgin Human Hair 3 Bundles Hair Weft: Machine Double Weft Hair Advantage:Nature Look,Suit for Any Occasion Hair Color: Three Tone #T1b-4-27. Warm Tips: If There Is Any Requirement, Please Feel Free To Contact Us Before You Place Orders.We Will Send the Wig In Medium Cap Size and Medium Brown Cap Color If Not Receive Change Message QA: Q1:Is this 1100 Percent Human Hair A:Yes.Testing by BURNING- Human hair will show white smoke while burning and then turn to ash; Synthetic hair will show black smoke and will be a sticky ball after burning. Q2:Hair Smell A:1100 Percent chemical free,it may have local shampoo smell,but can be removed by cowashing with shampoo and conditioner. Q3: How long does it last A:This hair can last for long time depending on how you maintain it.Usually my customers use for more than a year.Contact Us To Explain The Suitable Use Method For You! Q4:How Many Bundles Do I need for A Full Head A:Normally 3 bundles is enough for the Full Head.If You Like Thicker or Need Longer Hair,It's Better to Wear one More Bundle."] {'Brand': 'Agnes', 'Color': 'brown', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '12.2 x 9.84 x 2.09 inches; 11.68 Ounces', 'UPC': '735209921787'} What I didn’t like about the hair is, I purchased deep wave and when I added it in m hair, it was loose wave. The bottom color of the hair is very blonde so you will have to tone it down with a light brown rinse. If you are looking for curly hair, look for the kinky curly in two tone . It comes off very easily especially in the hot weather. The tape doesn’t last but 30 minutes on your face. It will not stick if you apply makeup. Band not long enough Not so great
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Purchase Preference:** The user continues to focus on human hair extensions, especially curly textures, but shows an increasing skepticism towards new brands. This skepticism is amplified by recent disappointing experiences with various products.

- **Quality Expectation:** The user demands exceptionally high standards, emphasizing softness, durability, and a natural appearance. Their experiences have reinforced the need for superior quality and authentic product claims, leading to stringent scrutiny in their evaluations.

- **Rating Trend:** The user has shifted towards a pattern of critical reviews, consistently marked by low scores. Dissatisfaction stems from product quality issues and misleading marketing, making them particularly discerning in their assessments.

- **Brand Affinity:** While open to exploring new brands, the user is now more cautious and critical, wary of unsubstantiated claims due to past negative experiences.

- **Hair Color Preference:** Preference remains for natural hair colors, with a keen eye for precise color representation following prior discrepancies.

- **Length Preference:** The user typically favors 18-inch extensions but is increasingly open to longer lengths.

- **Interaction Style:** Recent interactions reflect frustration across various product categories, signaling a significant shift toward critical evaluations, particularly regarding performance and reliability.

Overall, the user's recent experience with cosmetic products further emphasizes their need for high quality and transparent marketing, solidifying a more cautious and critical approach to all product selections.
